entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Cobourg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:56 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cobourg 04:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Temperature: 0.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -0.7°C
Wind: ESE 21 km/h gust 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with periods of rain this morning and ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing late this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
